hero.title: Seedream 4.5: The High-Fidelity AI Image Generator
hero.subtitle: Master prompt adherence without the headache. We built the ultimate no-code wrapper for Seedream 4.5 so you can generate precise, coherent images instantly. No complex setups, just pure creativity.

style2.title: Design 10x Faster with Seedream 4.5

style4.title: Turn Words into Visual Gold

style5.title: AI Image Generation Reimagined

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Seedream 4.5.

items.question: What is Seedream 4.5?
items.answer: Seedream 4.5 is an advanced AI tool that converts text descriptions into high-quality images using state-of-the-art machine learning models.

items.question: Do I own the images I create?
items.answer: Yes! If you are on the 'Pro' or 'Elite' plans, you own full commercial rights to your creations.

items.question: What formats can I download?
items.answer: We support high-res PNG and JPG. Elite users can also request upscaled versions suitable for print.

items.question: How fast is generation?
items.answer: Standard generation takes about 5-8 seconds. Turbo Mode (available on Elite plans) delivers results in under 3 seconds.

items.question: Can I get a refund?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee on all credit packs and subscriptions.

items.question: How does the refund policy work?
items.answer: If you're not happy with Seedream 4.5, contact us within 30 days. We'll refund your last payment, no hard feelings.
steps: Email support@seedream4-5.cc with your account email.
We process the refund within 3 business days.
Funds return to your card within 5-10 days.

items.question: How do I cancel?
items.answer: Go to your Dashboard > Subscription and click 'Cancel'. You keep your credits until the end of the billing period.

items.question: Can I switch plans?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time via the Dashboard. Upgrades are prorated.
points: Downgrading takes effect at the next renewal.

items.question: Is there human support?
items.answer: Yes! We have a dedicated support team. Pro and Elite users get priority queue jumping.

items.question: Why is it called Seedream 4.5?
items.answer: Because we combine serious 'Seedream' technology with creativity (and we like yellow). It's fun, but the tech is powerful.

items.question: Payment methods?
items.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Google Pay, and Apple Pay. Secure and encrypted.

items.question: Can I edit images?
items.answer: Yes, use our 'Inpainting' tool to redraw specific parts of an image without regenerating the whole thing.

items.question: API Access?
items.answer: Yes, the Seedream 4.5 API is available for Elite subscribers who want to build their own apps on our engine.

items.question: Is my data safe?
items.answer: Absolutely. We do not sell your personal data or your private image gallery to third parties.

items.question: Support Hours?
items.answer: Our bots work 24/7. Our humans work Mon-Fri 9am-6pm EST. Elite users get 24/7 priority email support.

items.question: Billing Cycle?
items.answer: We bill on the anniversary of your signup date. Credits reset monthly for subscribers.

items.question: Generation Speed?
items.answer: Seedream 4.5 is optimized for speed. Most images finish in under 6 seconds.

items.question: Languages supported?
items.answer: You can type prompts in English, Spanish, French, German, Korean, and Japanese. Our AI understands them all.

items.question: Privacy?
items.answer: We use bank-level encryption. Your prompts are your business, not ours.
